title: Rlpx Ping don't work with Besu
body:
### Description
When using the devp2p bin of geth to send a Rlpx ping to a node , besu don't respond.


### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)
- Clone [geth](https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum)
- Run `make all` command
- Run `./build/bin/devp2p rlpx ping <enode address>`

**Expected behavior:** [What you expect to happen]
The others implementations respond to the ping and the devp2p bin print information about the node in the terminal . 

Result with geth :
